ej,durol101,C,conlj102,Fair/foul call (Threw towel) $Norm Larker hit a popup in the infield; catcher Hal Smith ran under the ball, which fell untouched and bounced foul between HP and 1B; the Dodgers claimed Smith touched the ball; Dodgers Coach Leo Durocher threw a towel out of the dugout and was ejected by Conlan; Durocher ran onto the field and they each kicked at each other's shins; Don Drysdale pulled Durocher back to the dugout

ej,moonw101,P,donaa901,Call at 2B (Bumped umpire) $Wally Moon was running as Tommy Davis bunted; HP umpire Ken Ken Burkhart ruled it a foul ball but Hobie Landrith threw to 2B; Moon was called out on a close play by 2B umpire Augie Donatelli, who was unaware of the foul call at HP; Moon jumped up and argued with Donatelli, bumping the arbiter; Moon ejected by Augie Donatelli
$Bob Aspromonte was picked off 2B but returned safely; Tommy Davis had advanced during the rundown
